All India Transporters Welfare Association (AITWA) was established in the year 2000 as a society registered under Societies Registration Act, 1862 for the welfare of India's Road Transport Fraternity and to act as its mouthpiece in the matters related to country's Road Transport Industry. During the past Eleven years, AITWA has been recognized as one of the foremost apex body of India's Road Transport Sector by the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH)
